description: Retrieves the replication configuration for a specific file system. If a file system is not specified, all of the replication configurations for the Amazon Web Services account in an Amazon Web Services Region are retrieved.

nested_items.name: Replications
nested_items.description: The collection of replication configurations that is returned.

nested_items.name: SourceFileSystemId
nested_items.description: The ID of the source Amazon EFS file system that is being replicated.

nested_items.name: SourceFileSystemRegion
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services Region in which the source EFS file system is located.

nested_items.name: SourceFileSystemArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the current source file system in the replication configuration.

nested_items.name: OriginalSourceFileSystemArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the original source EFS file system in the replication configuration.

nested_items.name: CreationTime
nested_items.description: Describes when the replication configuration was created.

nested_items.name: Destinations
nested_items.description: An array of destination objects. Only one destination object is supported.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: Describes the status of the replication configuration. For more information about replication status, see Viewing replication details in the Amazon EFS User Guide.

nested_items.name: FileSystemId
nested_items.description: The ID of the destination Amazon EFS file system.

nested_items.name: Region
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services Region in which the destination file system is located.

nested_items.name: LastReplicatedTimestamp
nested_items.description: The time when the most recent sync was successfully completed on the destination file system. Any changes to data on the source file system that occurred before this time have been successfully replicated to the destination file system. Any changes that occurred after this time might not be fully replicated.

nested_items.name: OwnerId
nested_items.description: ID of the Amazon Web Services account in which the destination file system resides.

nested_items.name: StatusMessage
nested_items.description: Message that provides details about the PAUSED or ERRROR state of the replication destination configuration. For more information about replication status messages, see Viewing replication details in the Amazon EFS User Guide.

nested_items.name: RoleArn
nested_items.description: Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the IAM role in the source account that allows Amazon EFS to perform replication on its behalf. This is optional for same-account replication and required for cross-account replication.

nested_items.name: SourceFileSystemOwnerId
nested_items.description: ID of the Amazon Web Services account in which the source file system resides.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: You can use the NextToken from the previous response in a subsequent request to fetch the additional descriptions.
